column6:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). 
While I'm out traveling, I open my home for others to enjoy.

Features:
2 Bedrooms (Queen Beds)
2 Bath 
WiFi / Chromecast
Full Kitchen
Washer/Dryer
Private Yard
Free street parking
15-20 minute drive to downtown Austin
